mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName
select distinct d.dealYear from houseinfo i join housedeal d on i.aptCode = d.aptCode where i.dongCode = #{dong}

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildYear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, d.area, d.floor, d.dealAmount, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h join housedeal d on h.aptCode = d.aptCode left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where h.dongCode = #{dong} and d.dealYear = #{year} and d.dealMonth = #{month} order by aptName
